nodes.text: The Muuria system was located within the Trailing Sectors portion of the Inner Rim. The system was home to the sentient species known as the Muur, and it also shared its name with the company Muurian Interstellar.
The Muuria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square M-13.
